Галочка верификации для Вашей страницы.

data.name: Wirtualnemedia Dark
P7 Basecamp3 Tweaks
data.description: Tweaks to Basecamp3 for better UX on Chrome Desktop

data.name: olx.ua Dark
Binance Futures - no depth (new platform)
data.description: Remove binance depth chart on new futures platform. Please refresh frequently (from manage styles page) and report any issues. Binance continues to update their CSS which means this style sheet also needs frequent updating.

data.name: Plancke Dark Blue
data.description: A somewhat darker Plancke style sheet that feels better on the eyes. Now in Blue!

data.name: JeuxOnline JOL Theme Sombre Dark Mode
data.description: Un thème sombre perso pour JOL (https://www.jeuxonline.info), il n'est pas parfait (et fait à l'arrache) mais il m'aide à ne pas me tuer les yeux, alors si il peut être utile à d'autres :D

data.name: VLC Lua Dark Theme
data.description: Make the Lua web interface dark.

data.name: w3schools Dark by BamaBraves
Minimalist Dark Theme
Green and White Board
data.description: Changes the interactive board's colors to green and white.
